wikipedia_page.main: David Henry Adamson (born 7 May 1951) is an English former professional footballer who played in the Football League, as a defender between 1969 and 1985, he also made appearances for the England national C team. He made over 250 appearances and scored more than 132 goals in his career.

response: David or Dave Adamson may refer to:
* Dave Adamson (Australian footballer) (1874–1914), Australian rules footballer
